title: OPEN-FACED EGG, AVOCADO AND HASH BROWN BREAKFAST SANDWICHES
directions: In a bowl mash together the avocado, lemon juice, hot sauce, salt and pepper until desired consistency is reached.
While the English muffin is toasting fry the eggs.
Spread some of the avocado mash on top of the toasted English muffin halves and top with a slice of tomato, one of the Four Potato Hash Browns and a fried egg.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 English muffin, split in half and toasted
2 Dr. Praeger's Four Potato Hash Browns
Juice of half of a small lemon
Kosher salt and fresh ground black pepper to taste
2 eggs, fried or cooked to your liking
